info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Mitchell County through 900 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Lake Colorado City State Park, or 19 miles north of Sterling City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Mitchell County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
